title: Showroom space, Open, MULTI Beds and 2 Baths, WW, C-AIR, Fab Balcony
neighborhood: Belmont location, by Fresh pond area, Cambridge line
posting_body: Elongated living room, AIR, FRESHLY INSTALLED BERBER wall to wall, PRIVATE BALCONY, 2 FULL BATHS !
Penthouse style apartment.
Sports balcony that's bricked in at sides for exceptional privacy.
Green views galore.
Spacial 20 foot living room that's open to kitchen and dining.
Very spacial diggs.
Newer carpeting.
1 mile to Belmont center and 2 minutes to route 2.
Also within quick bike ride to Alewife.
This is a completely remodeled 1100 square feet (estimated) of contemporary space.
Spacious is used here not just as a word, living room for example is 20 x 14.
Then at adjacent wall, virtually all of it is made of glass (holding the gorgeous double glass doors that lead to your over sized balcony; thereat find 13 feet of glass).
Next we have a 16 x 14 master bedroom which provides huge walk in closet.
There are 2 other double closets plus a linen closet and 2 storage spaces.
All you can ask for.
2nd bed is also sizable.
There is both a master bath and a guest bath.
Fully stocked kitchen with wrap around counters, refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, stove, ample cabinet space.
Parking for 2 cars.
On site maintenance team covers all the grounds and even the snow removal.
Also, baths are FULL BATHS !
Overall space that's PRICED exceptionally WELL.
A No real estate fee prop.
Modest 2 months in funds, at approval, to secure it.
Ready now to September 1 latest.
Unique and stunning !
NO PETS please.
Call John Lambergs1 for more info.
Makes the grade!
